titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain pepperoncini prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid in concentrations at 0.5 percent or greater.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on certain pepperoncini prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid in concentrations at 0.5 percent or greater.
